title: Judy Blue Women's Mid Rise Tummy Control Destroy Skinny Denim Jeans, 88798
description: Judy Blue jeans run generous in size and have more stretch compared to other brands. We recommend sizing down one size in the skinny jeans, flares, and boot cuts and 2 sizes in the boyfriends or relaxed denim.
Please note the inseam length for these jeans. They are long so you may need to hem them or cut off the access length for the stylish frayed look.
We want you to be happy with your purchase. Follow these guidelines and your Judy Blue's will be your favorite jeans!

These Judy Blue High Waist Tummy Control Black Wash Skinny Jeans 88753 feature high waist design that not only provides a flattering fit but also offers slimming tummy control, giving you the confidence to rock your look. Made from high-quality materials, these Judy Blue jeans prioritize comfort without sacrificing style, ensuring you can wear them all day long, no matter the occasion. Judy Blue jeans are very stretchy compared to other brands. We recommend sizing down one size in most cases.
